items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know when Mary will visit Boston.
Tom doesn\'t like people who get angry easily.
Tom doesn\'t see why Mary needs a new bicycle.
I\'ve been looking forward to visiting Boston.
I\'ve forgotten whether you drink wine or not.
I\'ve got about an hour until I have to leave.
I\'ve just been to the airport to see Tom off.
I\'ve loved you since the day I first saw you.
I can\'t carry this suitcase. It\'s too heavy.
You\'re not telling me anything I don\'t know.
